website_summaries.verdict: Larger than average sized punch mitts that should stand up to hard workouts nicely.
pros: Thick padding in the wrist area straps keep the wrists protected during sparring and keep the mitts tightly in place
Shape of mitts forces your hands and arms into the proper position to absorb the punches
Good level of padding throughout the large mitts
Will stand up to tough workouts
cons: More expensive than punch mitts made for beginners
Takes longer to put on and take off

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These look like a cheap knockoff of the mitts pictured on the listing! Very thin "leather" as you can see especially on the face in my picture, that is, if they are even real leather any more! Stitch quality is much lower. They look like a cheap imitation of what's listed on Amazon, but I sent my pics to Ringside and they said they looked authentic. I guess some companies try to substitute an inferior product and hope people will still buy them because of their old reputation! What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Am0032

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best dont bother with the rest!
customer_reviews.text: Ringside is king when it comes to punch mitts. They invented the cobra style panther punch mitt and are head and shoulders above the competition. These are the best mitts in the game. Everything done right for a trainer that uses the mitts as a main source of teaching and training fighters/boxers. Then the price just makes it an absolute no brainer. Shane Colburn - Mittology certified instructor.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA COLBURN

customer_reviews.title: NOT ORIGINAL RINGSIDE MITTS
customer_reviews.text: I returned these mitts because they are not originals. The picture is not what you get. The picture has original ringside logo and ringside tag sewed on the side, what I received was a knock off of these mitts. They may work fine for beginners, but not for advanced boxers.
customer_reviews.author: Y.R

customer_reviews.title: These are great, comfortable and durable mitts
customer_reviews.text: These are great, comfortable and durable mitts. The striking surface is quite hard, so you get good feedback. The ball shape inside, where you grip, is very easy to hold on to and you won't have these gloves flying off. They are quite warm.
customer_reviews.author: Ruud Orm

customer_reviews.title: I love my Ringside Panther Boxing Punch Mitt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these punch mitts to train my 7-year-old daughter & I love them! They are easy to slip on & off, even while using hand wraps. The quality is good, they feel great on my hands, & they have a ball-shaped cushion for your palms that makes your hands feel secure when you're using them. I'm very happy with this buy & I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a solid, inexpensive punch mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Good design and construction.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these mitts for about 5 months. They feel great on the hands and are well designed and constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Shopper

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: My boxing coach, an MMA fighter, loves these. They are very comfortable to hold, and dissipate energy very efficiently, so you do not need to hold you punches much when using those. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: synergy7

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice mitts for the price - they could definitely have ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice mitts for the price - they could definitely have used a strap on the back, though. The ball grip makes it possible to keep a good hold on them anyway, but training partners with weaker hands may have trouble keeping these on for certain hit angles.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Come a Long Way
customer_reviews.text: The have great wrist support and enough padding to do hard mitt work.
customer_reviews.author: Daggwood

customer_reviews.title: more then worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: great set of punch mitt's..i have tried other's and some copy cat version's. but alway's come back to the classic's
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i defintely Got what i asked for...the quality is awesome and received at a low cost.i will continue to purchase ringside products. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rock!!!!

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: The size, shape, dimensions, are great. They fit well and offer a solid response when hit. The issue I had is that they don't seem to be made very well. The materials feel "ok", decent, but after only 3 months of use, three times a week for an hour, they've started falling apart. They look new still, yet seams are unraveling and glue is coming off. They are not wearing out, they are falling apart. These are maybe $40 mitts. Good for punching, but I wouldn't recommend holding these for and adult kicker.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Good for shorter workouts
customer_reviews.text: The inside grip on these mitts makes them difficult to hold for long periods of time, but gives impressive control while partnering for striking drills. The inside of the mitt is a small, half-dome hand grip your palm fits around that is standard in mitts like this. The grip doesn't offer much protection, so a bruised hand can result if you're not careful. Overall, these are great mitts for striking work and very durable. They've broken in well but aren't torn up after over a year of use. These hold their shape well, don't take up much space in your gym bag, and aren't too heavy they become cumbersome to wear during long training sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ferdig

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so much better to use than what we had
customer_reviews.text: My son had started in martial arts a few years back, and I clearly remember the equipment they offered in their little "kit" and their version of one of these... The difference couldn't be more obvious. Even just pulling them out of the bags they were in - clearly a level of quality light years past the junk we have had for years. These things are solid, the pads are firm without being uncomfortable to hit, and the ball inside to grip makes these SO much easier to work with compared to what we had been using. Construction is spot on as well, these were very well crafted and make workouts so much easier than what we previously had.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDad

customer_reviews.title: Great Boxing Pads for Training
customer_reviews.text: These work great as punching pads for a person with boxing gloves on. They fit "like a glove" with finger holes and a ball shaped form to fit in the palm to keep them steady. The punching side is firm and absorbs some of the hit. They are easy to put on and off and maneuver. They can take punches or kicks. The structure of them helps keep your wrists from being bent backward as well as protecting fingers from hits. They should keep your hands and wrists well protected and safe. They seem well-made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stephans

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit, thick padding reduces impact
customer_reviews.text: We have been setting up our home gym for sometime including bags, weights, gloves, and now these pads. The blue ones are much smaller and compact, the are gel micro mitts. They both for well even for smaller hands like mine or bigger hands as there is some give room. They work great, don’t really feel the impact of someone hitting because of the cushioning. I prefer the smaller ones as the fit great on my smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: Parker-Moore Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice, great feel.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mitts. The construction is top notch with a nice inner "ball" for your hands to take the punch and to properly train as the aggressor. The padding is nice and thick without being too soft or too bulky. I feel like I have very good control while using them and I can direct and deflect well without feeling to much or to little. All in all a very nice practice mitt that I think I will be using for many moons to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for practice.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for practicing punches and having someone else assist you with your punches. I have my son use these or myself and we practice together. Great padding. The fingers fit well for our hands but I feel these ones a smaller than the other two so it gives us more specific punching area. I received this item for my honest opinion and was not compensated.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Best mitts I have tried. Durable and designed to keep your hands and wrists safe.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best mitts that I have tried. They stay firmly in place due to the tight fitting hand compartments. The padding and straps force your hand and wrists into a position that reduces impact stresses and leaves your hands feeling a lot better than is the case when using inferior products. The material and stitching is flawless, and the overall feel is that these mitts will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting G-pa into being a target for a snap kicking Taekwondo G-daughter
customer_reviews.text: Gracious sakes but that girl can snap-kick higher over my head faster than I can yell "Noooo!". I've watched her train up to Black belt for some years. About all I could do was hold the boards for her to snap. These are an excellent home trainer for her kick targeting and power exercises. I'm very satisfied that I have a way to participate. The sparring makes me breaks a sweat to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Sotto voce

customer_reviews.title: Provide good absorption and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable punch pad mitts. Having used one other type in the past, I found the shock factor of taking punches just too much. The other option did not provide that same type of shock protection. These DO provide more shock protection and are much more comfortable than the others I have used. Attractive, protective and function.
customer_reviews.author: Diana de Avila

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, a solid value.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, largely due to the ball-shaped palm, which makes for an ergonomic holding position. The striking surface is firm, but provides good feedback. The leather/materials feel nice, and seem durable- time will tell. There are cheaper mitts out there, but these are a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthieu P. Raillard

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Solid and well made. The stitching is holding strong even after multiple hard punches and kicks. The hand grips seem to have a universal size as 4 different adults have used them. They are a bit big for children. Padding absorbs the shock of the punch well and doesn't hurt/ injure either set of hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McKelden Cave

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say, these are solid and well made. I have large hands and they fit, albeit tightly. The face of the pads is hard, so you will need proper mechanics as you can tear up some skin or spring a knuckle. Personally, I think that feedback is important so this is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: M. Flegal

customer_reviews.title: Highly Durable and Well-Fitting
customer_reviews.text: These Punch Pad Mitts are wonderfully constructed and highly durable. My kids and I are having a terrific time using them for exercise and just plain fun. They are great for upper body speed, movement and strength training. They fit very comfortably on the hands without any kind of slippage upon impact. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These 'Training Pads', from Ringside, are very well made. Excellent padding is incorporated and with an extraordinary good, tight, fit for my medium sized hands enabling an uninterrupted aggressive workout. I expect these pads will last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oterson

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality mitts that take a beating
customer_reviews.text: These are really high quality punching targets. Very comfortable on the hand, with no slipping around or adjustment required. They absorb the impact just fine and don't shift around. Constructions seems very high quality, and we were training in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Avrunin

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! These are the same gloves that we use in karate class and having a set at home means we can extend our practice. They’re comfortable enough to wear and they really well padded. They’re a bit stiff but I think they’ll loosen up after they get some use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, good hand protection.
customer_reviews.text: Good hand protection and they fit well. I use these to practice with my kids and they said they are similar to the one their mma gym uses. The surface is hard and the material is durable and a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Apparently these are superior gloves because they have a rounded bump inside them which makes it easier on the hand. They are considered to be top of the line for amateur boxing.
customer_reviews.author: TrueOBSESSION

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fitting and well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves. I wanted them to do some punching practices with my son, and they are perfect for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Great MMA Mitts, a little too tight.
customer_reviews.text: These are great mitts for kicking and punching. The stitching was done well in most areas, but some small spots had mistakes. I am a smaller guy and these fit pretty tight with hand wraps on. I'm guessing someone in the 200lb plus range may have some trouble getting these on at first. They do seem to stretch out the more they are used. I do recommend these mitts, and enjoy using them over Thai Pads.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

product_meta.title: Ringside Panther Boxing MMA Punch Mitt
product_meta.description: Unique contoured shape allows for more control and gives the coach and trainer both better leverage while working the boxing mitts. The Panther Mitts promote proper alignment of the wrists, arms and shoulders so that the impact from the punches are naturally dispersed and not absorbed by the joints. This technology allows longer workouts to help build stamina and endurance. Promotes safety for the boxer because it lessens the chance of a sprained wrist or injured knuckle that results from a poorly delivered punch. The snug fit hand compartment with a thickly padded leather wrist strap anchors the mitts to your hands, there's no Hook & Loop strap to fumble with.
feature_bullets: These panther focus punch mitts have a unique contoured shape allowing for more control and giving the coach and trainer both better leverage while working the boxing mitts
The target training pad mitts are made of durable leather and measure 10" x 7.5" x 3" in size
This easy to slip on and off pair features a contour fit to promote proper alignment of wrists, arms and shoulders
Perfect coach mitts for boxing, MMA, Muay Thai and partner contact sport athletes alike to practice a variety of punches and footwork
Complete your home or commercial gym with the proper fight training equipment to get your athletes in shape and competition ready
